name: Sakurada Mon
skill: Deals 3995/ DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).

additional_data.description: The spirit of a strong-willed girl who was killed unexpectedly.One day, She met a spirit while in a bit of a sulky mood, but seeing his strength inspired her to protect the streets better than ever before. Swearing to keep others from going through the tragedy she did, she works hard to protect all living things. Her uniform is proof that she works for justice.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Defeat Lv. 40, 50, 120, 160 Forge Washington.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Event: Random drops after LVL 40.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Get a First Half Ranking of 1000 and above.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Get a First Half Ranking of 2501~6000.
◦ "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" Get a Total Ranking of 7500 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.
◦ She was previously a Restless Ghost. 
◦ Her illustrator was mistakenly listed as Totomo.

main: "Leave it to me! I'll help out whoever."
skill: "I follow my own sense of justice!"
summon: "How do you like the uniform? Pretty sweet, huh?"
limit_break: "There's never gonna be another me, so I've gotta do my best!"
